import React from "react"; const TermsOfService = () => { return (

Terms of Service

Welcome to AstraTax. By accessing our AI-powered tax optimization platform, you agree to comply with the following terms.

1. User Responsibilities

Users must provide accurate financial details. AstraTax is not liable for any inaccuracies in tax filings.

2. AI Assistance Disclaimer

Our AI provides insights but does not replace professional tax consultation. Users are encouraged to review all AI suggestions.

3. Prohibited Activities

Misuse of AstraTax for fraudulent tax filings or data tampering will lead to permanent account suspension.

For more details, reach out to legal@astratax.ai.

); }; export default TermsOfService;
